item.title: A further explanation of the ratel (or Mellivora): why it is like a man
item.summary: The vicious Water–tortoise and the charitable Ratel (Mellivora), a fable related to Dia!kwãin, by his mother (L V.-5. 4265-4291). The Ratel used to be a man.
item.comments: 1) See also The Story of the Ratel (or Mellivora) and the Waterskilpad and The story of the Leopard Tortoise, 2) This story is found in Book V-5
item.author: Dia!kwain (David Hoesar) (V)
